description: Cape item mappings for AC Brotherhood SAV files (Block 4)

capes.name: Venetian Cape
capes.notes: Facebook-exclusive cape, unlockable by setting ownership flag to 0x01

capes.name: Medici Cape
capes.notes: Facebook-exclusive cape, unlockable by setting ownership flag to 0x01

unlock_method.description: Find cape by hash in Block 4, verify ID at hash_offset+14, set byte at hash_offset+13 to 0x01
